channel.title: Posts on Byron Wasti
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Byron Wasti

item.title: Prusto Watch #1: First Steps into Arm and the Embedded-Rust Ecosystem
item.description: In this post I will describe my initial dive into Arm development using Rust. There are potentially many mistakes in my understanding, so this post should not be used as a reference for how to do embedded development in Rust. However, I think it is useful to describe the learning process being new to Rust and Arm development so that those more experienced can see the pain-points of getting started.

item.title: Prusto Watch #0: Design & Goals of the Project
item.description: Code Repo is here: https://github.com/byronwasti/prusto-watch Hardware Repo is here: https://github.com/byronwasti/prusto-watch-hardware The Prusto Watch is an Open Source smart watch with firmware written in Rust, or at least it will be that one day. Currently, the Prusto Watch is just a concept. I plan on writing a series of blog posts documenting my progress in developing the watch, with a focus on going through my thought process. A large goal of this project is to help document the current state of embedded development in Rust, since currently there is not a lot out there.
